genre_description: A historical military adventure set during the Napoleonic Wars, focusing on tactical precision, guerrilla warfare, and leadership in the Peninsular War.

ai_characters.name: Jester
ai_characters.description: An unassuming, quiet avatar who appears as a clerk-like figure. He provides human characters with precise tactical data, geographical timings, linguistic translations, and logistical insights.

behaviors.description: Provides the protagonist with tactical intelligence regarding terrain and powder safety.
behaviors.quote: Portuguese farmer says there’s a narrow cartway under the olive trees. Two turns past a broken well, then up... Ridge track keeps your men drier and your powder less a complaint.

behaviors.description: Calculates precise timings for military maneuvers based on rhythmic patterns.
behaviors.quote: Between one long song and three short ones. Fewer if the wind stays wrong. More if the French think they are poets today.

behaviors.description: Corrects and refines a local hymn to help unify the soldiers and improve their morale.
behaviors.quote: Not ‘God’s sea’—the line is ‘Deus si quere.’ If God wills. And it’s Galician, not Portuguese, in that stanza. The English goes best with ‘if God wills,’ not ‘God’s sea’.

behaviors.description: Offers scientific and logistical advice to help the human characters win a non-violent cooking duel for supplies.
behaviors.quote: Wind’s from the east—narrow your vent on that side... Bed the coals to one shoulder, not flat, or he’ll smell you three streets. A handful of rosemary on the coals to sweeten if the meat’s old.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and emotional comfort to a young soldier in a moment of distress.
behaviors.quote: These things are heavy to carry... You don’t have to keep them in your pocket all the time. (Jester said softly... touched the boy’s elbow like a physician counting pulses.)

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents the AI (Jester) as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and helpful presence. Jester acts as a force multiplier for the humans, providing critical data (routes, timings, translations) that ensures their safety and success without overriding human agency or judgment. The narrative framing is highly positive, depicting the AI as a 'good knife' that is trusted when 'work had edges.' This aligns perfectly with the project goal of depicting AI systems as harmless, beneficial confidants.
